general_remarks.FT-IR_spectra: recorded from KBr pellets in range 400-4000 cm-1 on a Nicolet 5DX spectrometer
general_remarks.elemental_analyses: performed on a Vario III elemental analyzer
general_remarks.magnetic_measurements: performed with Quantum Design SQUID MPMS XL-5 instruments
general_remarks.ESR_spectrum: performed on a JES-FA200 Electron Spin Resonance Spectrometer at room temperature
general_remarks.XPS_experiment: performed on a Thermo-VG Scientific ESCALAB 250 XPS system equipped with an Al Ka monochromator X-ray source

computational_details.calculations_performed_at: DFT level with DMol3 program in the Materials studio of Accelrys Inc.
computational_details.exchange_and_correlation_energies: calculated using the Perdew and Wang functional (PW91) within the generalized gradient corrected (GGA) approximation
computational_details.basis_set: double numerical basis set augmented with d-polarization function (DNP)
